content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: purple_concrete_powder
inventory=[{"type": "torch", "quantity": 47, "index": 13}, {"type": "black_stained_glass", "quantity": 5, "index": 14}, {"type": "cut_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 44, "index": 15}, {"type": "cyan_wool", "quantity": 51, "index": 16}, {"type": "purple_banner", "quantity": 10, "index": 19}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 26, "index": 21}, {"type": "cyan_banner", "quantity": 8, "index": 22}, {"type": "red_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "lapis_ore", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "cobblestone_stairs", "quantity": 48, "index": 26}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 60, "index": 27}, {"type": "carrot_on_a_stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 29, "index": 33}, {"type": "gravel", "quantity": 4, "index": 34}, {"type": "cod_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "beef", "quantity": 54, "index": 36}, {"type": "acacia_stairs", "quantity": 46, "index": 39}, {"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 58, "index": 40}, {"type": "birch_log", "quantity": 4, "index": 41}, {"type": "sand", "quantity": 4, "index": 43}]

thought: To craft purple_concrete_powder, I need to first craft purple dye, which needs blue dye. Blue dye can be crafted from lapis lazuli, which can be smelted from lapis ore. Therefore, I will first smelt the lapis ore into an empty slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 25 to slot 11 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: purple_concrete_powder
inventory=[{"type": "lapis_lazuli", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "torch", "quantity": 47, "index": 13}, {"type": "black_stained_glass", "quantity": 5, "index": 14}, {"type": "cut_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 44, "index": 15}, {"type": "cyan_wool", "quantity": 51, "index": 16}, {"type": "purple_banner", "quantity": 10, "index": 19}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 26, "index": 21}, {"type": "cyan_banner", "quantity": 8, "index": 22}, {"type": "red_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "cobblestone_stairs", "quantity": 48, "index": 26}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 60, "index": 27}, {"type": "carrot_on_a_stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 29, "index": 33}, {"type": "gravel", "quantity": 4, "index": 34}, {"type": "cod_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "beef", "quantity": 54, "index": 36}, {"type": "acacia_stairs", "quantity": 46, "index": 39}, {"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 58, "index": 40}, {"type": "birch_log", "quantity": 4, "index": 41}, {"type": "sand", "quantity": 4, "index": 43}]

Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: purple_concrete_powder

TASK: Craft an item of type: purple_concrete_powder

thought: To craft a purple_concrete_powder, I need to craft a purple_dye and then place the purple_dye with sand and gravel in the crafting grid. The purple_dye needs to be crafted from a blue_dye and a red_dye. So, I will start by moving the blue_dye from slot 11 to the crafting grid (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1
